hero.title: Solar fuel from plastic waste — where no truck comes.
hero.lead: Decentralised solar pyrolysis turns non-recyclable plastics into local fuel for boat-only coastal communities.

problem.heading: Problem
problem.text: Ladrilleros can only be reached by boat (~1 h from Buenaventura). Diesel is expensive; washed-up waste is openly burned.

how.heading: How it works
how.text: Shredder → Pyrolysis (O₂-free 400–550 °C) → Fractional condensation → Fuel; syngas feeds the heat.

business.heading: Business Model
business.gate: Gate fee for taking non-recyclable plastics
